DOC.brief_summary: This study is a prospective, cross-sectional survey to be administered to real patients in remission from DLBCL using a 15-minute postal or online survey. The project is designed to describe the impact of DLBCL remission on health utility and quality of life. Data collection will occur over a 4-month period.
DOC.brief_title: Utility Study in Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma (DLBCL)
DOC.criteria: Adults greater than or equal to (>/=) 18 years of age Diagnosis of DLBCL and currently in first remission Prior drug treatment for DLBCL Receiving active treatment for DLBCL Relapsed following any treatment for DLBCL
